toast.unsavedChangesMessage: You have not saved your recent changes. Continue without saving ?

validation.minLength: This field should have at least {min} characters

home.welcomeText:
Knowage is the full open source suite for analytics and business intelligence combining traditional and big data sources to provide valuable and meaningful information.
Start your analysis now!

export.completedWithErrors: Export completed with errors. Please read logs for further information.

import.completedWithErrors: Import completed with errors. Please read logs for further information.

advancedOptions.abandonedTimeoutInfo: Timeout in seconds before an abandoned (in use) connection can be removed. The value should be set to the longest running query your applications might have.
advancedOptions.logAbandonedInfo: Flag to log stack traces for application code which abandoned a Statement or Connection. Logging of abandoned Statements and Connections adds overhead for every Connection open or new Statement because a stack trace has to be generated.
advancedOptions.maxTotalInfo: Sets the maximum total number of idle and borrows connections that can be active at the same time.
advancedOptions.maxWaitInfo: The maximum number of seconds that the pool will wait (when there are no available connections) for a connection to be returned before throwing an exception.
advancedOptions.minEvictableIdleTimeMillisInfo: The minimum amount of time an object may sit idle in the pool before it is eligible for eviction.
advancedOptions.removeAbandonedOnBorrowInfo: Flag to remove abandoned connections if they exceed the Remove Abandoned Timeout when borrowObject is invoked. If set to true a connection is considered abandoned and eligible for removal if it has not been used for more than 'Remove Abandoned Timeout' seconds.
advancedOptions.removeAbandonedOnMaintenanceInfo: Flag to remove abandoned connections if they exceed the Remove Abandoned Timeout during pool maintenance. If set to true a connection is considered abandoned and eligible for removal if it has not been used for more than 'Remove Abandoned Timeout' seconds.
advancedOptions.testOnReturnInfo: Returns the value of the testOnReturn property. Returns true if objects are validated before being returned to the pool.
advancedOptions.testWhileIdleInfo: Returns the value of the testWhileIdle property. Returns true if objects examined by the idle object evictor are validated.
advancedOptions.timeBetweenEvictionRunsInfo: The number of seconds to sleep between runs of the idle connection validation/cleaner thread. This value should not be set under 1 second. It dictates how often we check for idle, abandoned connections, and how often we validate idle connections.
advancedOptions.title: Advanced Options
advancedOptions.validationQueryInfo: The SQL query that will be used to validate connections from this pool before returning them to the caller. If specified, this query does not have to return any data, it just can't throw a SQLException. The default value is null. If not specified, connections will be validation by the isValid() method. Example values are SELECT 1(mysql), select 1 from dual(oracle), SELECT 1(MS Sql Server)

form.jndiInfo: For the data source configuration you should specify the connection pool configured inside the application server. For example: Tomcat: java:comp/env/jdbc/foodmart; JBoss: jdbc/foodmart.

metadata.hint: The metadata allows you to access and write metadata inside your users document. It's possible to change the type between the allowed ones and to name and describe it. Click on one existing item from the list on the side, or press the "+" button to add one.
metadata.title: Metadata Management

profileAttributesManagement.hint:
Profile attributes allows you to better define different users properties. It's possible to change the name, the description or the types. It's also possible to get a value from a LOV.
Click on one existing item from the list on the side, or press the "+" button to add one.
profileAttributesManagement.name: Name
profileAttributesManagement.title: Profile Attributes Management

widgetGallery.hint: The templates allow you to access ready-made elements to proceed more quickly to the creation of dashboards. To view the details of a template, select one of those on the side, or press the "+" button to add or import one.
widgetGallery.noResults: No templates available for the selected filter

tags.availableCharacters: Allowed values for tags: uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, '-', '_'. The space character is not allowed.

widgetGallery.templateDoYouWantToDeleteTemplate: Do you want to delete this template?
widgetGallery.templateIsNotSaved: The template was not saved. Do you want to download it anyway?
widgetGallery.title: Gallery management
